title: Sergio Marchionne | Biography, Chrysler, & Facts | Britannica Money
snippet: Though lacking in engineering experience, Marchionne was unexpectedly selected two years later as CEO of the automotive division Fiat Group Automobiles SpA. He quickly returned the troubled car company to profitability, however, by downsizing and restructuring management as well as by speeding the introduction of new models, notably the retro-styled minicar sensation Fiat 500. In 2009 Marchionne replaced Robert Nardelli as CEO of Chrysler Group LLC.
